name: Green Dodge (Mobile Prototype)
description:
This is a mobile prototype I made a long time ago with Godot. Please try it out and then leave a comment on what you think. and/or any advice you have. (I'm currently not making any games but I may in the future.)

If you're playing this game on a computer, here are the controls:

  • Enter: Stars the game.
  • Left arrow key: Moves player to the top of the screen.
  • Down arrow key: Moves player to the middle of the screen.
  • Right arrow key: Moves player to the bottom of the screen.

Your main objective of the game is to avoid touching the green squares as long as you can. You can use a timer or a stopwatch or something to see how long you can survive and then comment down below how long you survived.
